thread.title: Jeffrey Weinstein
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Jeffrey Weinstein

author: Jeffrey Weinstein
title: Jeffrey Weinstein
text: I came in to change the steel wheels on my Tacoma to alloy wheels. I worked with Brandon at the Rutland VT store. He took the time to explain everything and arranged to have the work done. In the process it was discovered that the lug nuts from my old wheels wouldn't fit my new wheels. Brandon called around town and located the appropriate lug nuts for me to complete the installation. Terrific service "above and beyond"!
